changelog.change: Improved Game Version text when no game is running, an unknown version is running, and an unsupported version is running.
Added a warning label when a Scriptable Auto Splitter is present in the LiveSplit layout to help prevent undefined behavior.
Fixed double-split issue in Natla's Mines due to an in-game cutscene after the stats screen.
Hotfix for GameTime initialization causing GameTime splits to sometimes not display.
Initial release. FG, IL / Section, and Deathrun support with automatic Start, Split, and optional Reset. Supports LiveSplit's Undo Split.
